languages.text: "Среди династии Чорда и припоминать-то толком некому — у Инцендии нет наследников. И потом, священный Патент, как ни удивительно, не запрещает Вольным Торговцам воевать друг с другом".
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Vladaym.
Abelard: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: "Среди династии Чорда и припоминать-то толком некому — у Инцендии нет наследников. И потом, священный Патент, как ни удивительно, не запрещает Вольным Торговцам воевать друг с другом".

languages.text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Vladaym.
Abelard: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."
languages.original_text: "Среди династии Чорда и припоминать-то толком некому — у Инцендии нет наследников. И потом, священный Патент, как ни удивительно, не запрещает Вольным Торговцам воевать друг с другом".

traits.locale_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

"If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

"If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

"If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

"If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

"If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

languages.text: 「もしお前がチョーダ家のことを言っているのなら、恨みを抱く者はほとんど残っていない。インセンディアの後を継げる後継者がいないのだから。それに、意外に思うかもしれないが、聖なる令状は、ローグトレーダー同士の戦争を禁じてはいない」
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: 「もしお前がチョーダ家のことを言っているのなら、恨みを抱く者はほとんど残っていない。インセンディアの後を継げる後継者がいないのだから。それに、意外に思うかもしれないが、聖なる令状は、ローグトレーダー同士の戦争を禁じてはいない」

languages.text: "Falls Ihr Euch auf Haus Chorda bezieht: Es ist kaum mehr jemand übrig, der einen Groll hegen könnte, weil es keine Erben gibt, die Incendias Platz einnehmen könnten. Abgesehen davon: So überraschend es auch sein mag, der heilige Handelsbrief verbietet es Freihändlern nicht, Krieg gegeneinander zu führen."
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr Euch auf Haus Chorda bezieht: Es ist kaum mehr jemand übrig, der einen Groll hegen könnte, weil es keine Erben gibt, die Incendias Platz einnehmen könnten. Abgesehen davon: So überraschend es auch sein mag, der heilige Handelsbrief verbietet es Freihändlern nicht, Krieg gegeneinander zu führen."

languages.text: « Si vous parlez de la maison Chorda, je vois mal qui pourrait lui tenir rancune, étant donné qu'il ne reste aucun héritier pour prendre la place d'Incendia. De plus, aussi étonnant que cela puisse paraître, la lettre de marque sacrée n'interdit pas aux libres-marchands de se faire la guerre. »
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous parlez de la maison Chorda, je vois mal qui pourrait lui tenir rancune, étant donné qu'il ne reste aucun héritier pour prendre la place d'Incendia. De plus, aussi étonnant que cela puisse paraître, la lettre de marque sacrée n'interdit pas aux libres-marchands de se faire la guerre. »

languages.text: «Si lo dice por la casa Chorda, apenas queda nadie en posición de guardar rencor porque no hay herederos que ocupen el lugar de Incendia. Además, por sorprendente que parezca, la sagrada Patente no impide que los Comerciantes Independientes se declaren la guerra entre sí».
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: «Si lo dice por la casa Chorda, apenas queda nadie en posición de guardar rencor porque no hay herederos que ocupen el lugar de Incendia. Además, por sorprendente que parezca, la sagrada Patente no impide que los Comerciantes Independientes se declaren la guerra entre sí».

languages.text: “如果你指的是库尔达家族的人，那恐怕不会有任何人怀恨在心，因为因森蒂娅的宝座没有任何继承人。另外，神圣授状居然没有禁止行商浪人之间互相开战，这实在是令人惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: “如果你指的是库尔达家族的人，那恐怕不会有任何人怀恨在心，因为因森蒂娅的宝座没有任何继承人。另外，神圣授状居然没有禁止行商浪人之间互相开战，这实在是令人惊讶。”

languages.text: "Chorda Hanesi'ni kastediyorsan hatırlanacağını sanmam. Zira İncendia'nın yerini alabilecek kimse kalmadı. Ayrıca şaşıracaksın ama kutsal Ruhsatname, Hür Tacirlerin birbirleriyle savaşmasını yasaklamıyor."
languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda Hanesi'ni kastediyorsan hatırlanacağını sanmam, çünkü İncendia'nın yerini alabilecek kimse kalmadı. Ayrıca şaşıracaksın ama kutsal Ruhsatname, Hür Tacir'lerin birbirleriyle savaşmasını yasaklamıyor."

languages.original_text: "If you are referring to House Chorda, then there is hardly anyone left who could hold a grudge because there are no heirs who could take Incendia's place. Besides, as surprising as it may be, the sacred Warrant does not prohibit Rogue Traders from warring with one another."
